body_html: You're right, I printed all the Const ops and there were 712 Const ops, some which were created under gradient code. The ops total 431797 bytes on resnet50, so the memory leak issue will likely have a negligible impact, but we can measure its performance when switching to using fill.

body: You're right, I printed all the Const ops and there were 712 Const ops, some which were created under gradient code. The ops total 431797 bytes on resnet50, so the memory leak issue will likely have a negligible impact, but we can measure its performance when switching to using fill.
